title: Test
summary: This bar chart has 9 categories on the x axis representing Company, and Number of gas stations in each Company on the y axis.
The highest category is found at Total where Number of gas stations is 121.0.
The lowest category is found at Dyneff where Number of gas stations is 8.0.
The highest value at Total is almost 15.12 times larger than the minimum value of Dyneff.
The highest value at Total is almost 15.12 times larger than the minimum value of Dyneff.
The difference between the max Company Total and min Company Dyneff is 113.0.
